b'@Rollinopi @AimHardy $PTGEF nice Canadian biotech holding company; reminds me of $FBIO in the USA; tiny valuations, lots of shots on goal, economies of scale for their subsidiaries & partnered firms via corporate overhead savings, shared knowledge, etc.; much larger $BBIO is similar'

b'From what I can see $FBIO is his investment office\xe2\x80\x99s only public investment. Plenty of companies in the name to make it interesting...but for a billionaire...wondering what makes this investment worth his time...especially at just $15-20mm'

b'To small to really make any noise but $FBIO had a new investor announcement. Canadian billionaire Daryl Katz has a 5.87% position in the name. For a guy with $3.5B to his name seems like small peanuts...don\xe2\x80\x99t know much history on his business dealings but built success in'
